Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the frog skin active peptide family (Brevinin subfamily)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus ATCC2592 (MIC=19 µM), Bacillus licheniformis X39 (MIC=39 µM), Rhodococcus rhodochrous X15 (MIC=9.5 µM);Gram-negative bacterium:Psychrobacter faecalis X29 (MIC=9.5 µM).Fungi:Slime mould 090223 (MIC=37.5 µM), Candida albicans ATCC2002 (MIC=19 µM).
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Function: It shows poor hemolycity activity (LC50=300 uM).

Literature.Title: Novel brevinins from Chinese piebald odorous frog (Huia schmackeri) skin deduced from cloned biosynthetic precursors.
Literature.Author: Quan Z, Zhou M, Chen W, Chen T, Walker B, Shaw C.
